channel.title: How I fix compiler?
channel.description:
[B]How do I fix this so I can compile. All I need is to fix so I can compile then i can host server please post below with how to fix or commentary on youtube on how to fix.[/B][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee364/Tyler12115/Untitled-1.jpg[/img]
[B]If you can't read it. It says: The System cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue.[/B]

item.title: How I fix compiler?
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

to elaborate:

that particular batch command with look for java.exe in your system folder (that’s where cmd.exe is located and batch files invoke cmd.exe). to avoid putting java.exe in your system folder (and doing just that might cause problems for you), i’d suggest making sure the path is correct. if you don’t want to manually get the path and type it each time you want to compile in a terminal, i’d suggest setting your path, because you are on windows.

3rd solution: put your server folder in the jdk bin

i don’t recommend the first or third solution btw

Read full topic

item.title: How I fix compiler?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

  1. Go to your Program Files.
  2. Go to your Java File.
  3. Right click your .Batch file and click “Edit”.
  4. Replace the Java Version with your current Version.

Read full topic
